message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. This gives us a good head start and leaves room for negotiation.
Your starting offer was a bit imbalanced.  This is more in line with the diminishing returns we both face as time goes on.
Your offer doesn't account for the faster rate of inflation on your end. I'm proposing a more balanced adjustment.
We're running out of time, and these offers are getting less valuable by the minute.  This is my final offer.
